summary: Completed comprehensive testing of the new Marketing Landing Page feature. All backend APIs and frontend UI components are working correctly. The landing page displays at '/' route with stats from backend, video modal opens when configured, navigation buttons work, and admin can manage landing content.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Marketing landing page feature is fully functional. Backend has GET /api/v1/public/landing-content (public) and GET/PUT /api/v1/admin/landing-content (admin only) endpoints. Frontend has MarketingLandingPage.js at '/' route and AdminLandingContent.js at '/admin/landing-content'. Video modal works when videoUrl is configured. Stats display from backend data.

features_tested.landing_page_display: PASS - Marketing landing page displays correctly at '/' route
features_tested.stats_from_backend: PASS - Stats section shows data from backend API (60,000+ Active Creators, 15,000+ Campaigns, 1M+ Content, 6.5x ROI)
features_tested.video_modal: PASS - Video modal opens when 'See How It Works' button clicked (videoUrl configured)

navigation_buttons.cta_buttons: PASS - Bottom CTA buttons work correctly

admin_landing_content.sidebar_menu: PASS - 'Landing Page' menu item present in admin sidebar

role_based_access.brand_blocked: PASS - Brand users cannot access admin endpoints (403)
role_based_access.influencer_blocked: PASS - Influencer users cannot access admin endpoints (403)

features_tested.tabs_section: PASS - For Brands/For Creators tabs switch correctly
